title: Looking for people to play with!  (IGN: xPrinny)
body:
Hi, Im looking for people to play with! Im on regularly and willing to play pretty much any game-mode except bots. 

I've been on and off league since season 2. I love playing ARAMs, currently Gold V in ranked (but more of a Silver V player xP). I see myself as a calm and friendly player, competitive when playing serious games!

Looking for players of all skill levels! Add me on xPrinny

replies.body: Yo, add me GORDONNODROG Im S5 atm, Top and Jungle main. Looking to climb as well. :)
I would love to play with you. I am silver playing adc support and mid. Add me rllegent
I would love to play, well. As long as you don't mind Bronze players.  Add me: RedNalick
